mapper.insert: insert into route(route_id, route_short_name, route_long_name , route_desc, route_type, route_url, route_color, route_text_color) values (#{routeID},#{routeShortName},#{routeLongName},#{routeDesc},#{routeType},#{routeUrl},#{routeColor},#{routeTextColor})
mapper.select: SELECT trip.direction, route.route_id, route.route_short_name, route.route_long_name FROM trip JOIN route ON route.route_id = trip.route_id WHERE trip.id = #{tripID}
